description.arabic: ‏احصل على جميع الجوائز.
description.english: Earn all trophies.
description.french: Remportez tous les trophées.
description.german: Erlange alle Trophäen.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei.
description.spanish: Gana todos los trofeos.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اربح مباراة في WrestleMania بين Undertaker و Sting. (لعب فردي)
description.english: WWE Universe - Win a WrestleMania match between Undertaker and Sting. (Single play)
description.french: Univers WWE - Remportez un match entre Undertaker et Sting à WrestleMania (mode solo).
description.german: WWE-Universum - Gewinne ein Match bei WrestleMania zwischen Undertaker und Sting. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci un match a WrestleMania fra The Undertaker e Sting. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Gana un combate en WrestleMania entre Undertaker y Sting. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - العب واربح 50 مباراة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Play and win 50 matches.
description.french: Univers WWE - Disputez et remportez 50 matchs.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Spiele und gewinne 50 Matches.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Affronta e vinci 50 match.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y gana 50 combates.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اربح الـRoyal Rumble واحصل على الـWWE World HW Championship في WrestleMania.
description.english: WWE Universe - Win the Royal Rumble and get the WWE World HW Championship at WrestleMania.
description.french: Univers WWE - Gagnez le Royal Rumble et obtenez le WWE World HW Championship à WrestleMania.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Gewinne Royal Rumble und hole die WWE World HW Championship bei WrestleMania.
description.italian: WWE Universe – Vinci la Royal Rumble e ottieni il WWE World HW Championship a WrestleMania.
description.spanish: Universo WWE – Gana el Royal Rumble y obtén el WWE World HW Championship en WrestleMania

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - أوصل أي صفات Superstar شخصية لحدها الأقصى من خلال لعب مباراة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Max any personality trait of a Superstar by playing in a match.
description.french: Univers WWE - Maximisez un des traits de personnalité d'une Superstar en disputant un match.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Maximiere einen Persönlichkeitszug eines Superstars in einem Match.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Porta al massimo un tratto della personalità di una Superstar in un match.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Maximiza un rasgo de personalidad de una Superstar luchando en un combate.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - أنشئ عروضأً كبرى من يوم الإثنين إلى السبت وعيّن نفس الـSuperstar لكل عرض.
description.english: WWE Universe - Create Major Shows for Mon-Sat and assign the same Superstar to each show.
description.french: Univers WWE - Créez des shows majeurs du lundi au samedi et affectez-leur à tous la même Superstar.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Erstelle Hauptshows für Mo.-Sa. und weise denselben Superstar jeder Show zu.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Crea Show principali da lun. a sab. e assegna la stessa Superstar a tutti gli show.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Crea shows mayores de lunes a sábado y asigna la misma Superstar a cada uno.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اجعل Superstar يتعافى بالكامل من إصابة حرجة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Have a Superstar completely recover from a critical injury.
description.french: Univers WWE - Ayez une Superstar qui se remette totalement d'une blessure grave.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Erreiche, dass ein Superstar sich komplett von einer kritischen Verletzung erholt.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Fai recuperare completamente una Superstar da un infortunio grave.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Haz que una Superstar se recupere por completo de una lesión crítica.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - ألحق بخصمك إصابة حرجة أثناء المباراة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Inflict a critical injury status effect on an opponent in a match.
description.french: Univers WWE - Infligez une blessure grave à un adversaire pendant un match.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Füge einem Gegner in einem Match eine kritische Verletzung zu.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Infliggi l'effetto di stato 'infortunio grave' a un avversario in un match.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Inflige un estado de lesión crítica a un rival en un combate.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - كدس حالتي الاندفاع وسلسلة الانتصارات القوية حتى 10 من خلال اللعب أو المحاكاة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Stack both Momentum and Hot Streak statuses to 10 through gameplay or simulation.
description.french: Univers WWE - Montez Momentum et Belle lancée jusqu'au niveau 10, en jouant ou en simulant.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Bring den Schwung- und den Guter Lauf-Statuseffekt durch Spielen/Simulation auf 10.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Porta 'Slancio' e 'Serie di vittorie' a 10 nel gioco o nella simulazione.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Acumula efectos de estados Impulso y Racha hasta 10, mediante juego o simulación.

displayName.italian: I fatti contano più delle parole

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - غيّر صفة الـSuperstar الشخصية السائدة من خلال اللعب.
description.english: WWE Universe - Have the dominant personality trait of a Superstar change via gameplay.
description.french: Univers WWE - Modifiez un des traits dominants d'une Superstar en jouant.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Ändere den Hauptpersönlichkeitszug eines Superstars durchs Spielen.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Cambia il tratto della personalità predominante di una Superstar con un match.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Cambia un rasgo dominante de personalidad de una Superstar en un combate.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - استخدم Money in the Bank في WrestleMania واربح البطولة.
description.english: WWE Universe - Cash in Money in the Bank at WrestleMania and win the Championship.
description.french: Univers WWE - Utilisez la mallette Money in the Bank à WrestleMania et remportez le titre.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Löse den Money in the Bank-Koffer bei WrestleMania ein und gewinne den Titel.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci il titolo incassando il Money in the Bank a WrestleMania.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Canjea el maletín de Money in the Bank en WrestleMania y gana el título.

description.arabic: ‏اربح مباراة من خلال تثبيت قذر. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Win a match via dirty pin. (Single play)
description.french: Remportez un match sur un tombé avec triche (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne ein Match durch einen unfairen Pin. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci un match con uno schienamento sleale. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Gana un combate mediante un pin sucio. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏ادفع منافسك إلى الحبال أثناء مصارعة الهجوم المرتد لتنفيذ إيقاف نظيف. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Push opponent into the ropes during chain wrestling to perform a clean break. (Single play)
description.french: Poussez votre adversaire dans les cordes pour réussir un Clean Break (mode solo).
description.german: Drücke den Gegner beim Kettenwrestling in die Seile, um dich sauber zu befreien. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Durante mosse concatenate, spingi un avversario alle corde per un break pulito. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Empuja al rival contra las cuerdas en una lucha en cadena para escapar limpiamente. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏نفذ Big E Spear. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Execute a Big E Spear. (Single play)
description.french: Exécutez un Big E Spear (mode solo).
description.german: Führe einen Big E Spear aus. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Esegui una Big E Spear. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Ejecuta un Big E Spear. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏اضرب خصمك بغرض خارجي أو ألقِ به على طاولة. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Hit an opponent with a foreign object or put them through a table. (Single play)
description.french: Frappez un adversaire avec un objet ou faites-le passer à travers une table (mode solo).
description.german: Triff einen Gegner mit einem Objekt oder lass ihn durch einen Tisch krachen. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Colpisci un avversario con un oggetto o fagli rompere un tavolo. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Golpea a un rival con un objeto o haz que atraviese una mesa. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏اعكس حركة curb stomp بحركة RKO catch Finisher.
description.english: Reverse a curb stomp with the RKO catch Finisher.
description.french: Contrez un Curb Stomp à l'aide d'un Catching Finisher RKO.
description.german: Kontere einen Curb Stomp mit dem RKO-Catch-Finisher.
description.italian: Contrattacca una Curb Stomp con la mossa finale aerea RKO.
description.spanish: Invierte un Curb Stomp con el remate aéreo RKO.

description.arabic: ألقِ بالخصم على طاولة المذيع باستخدام لحظة OMG!. (لعب فردي/معرض)
description.english: Put your opponent through the announce table via OMG! moment. (Single play/Exhibition)
description.french: Fracassez votre adversaire à travers la table des commentateurs avec un OMG ! (Solo/Exhibition).
description.german: Befördere deinen Gegner mit einem OMG!-Moment durch den Ansagertisch. (Einzelspieler/Exhibition)
description.italian: Sbatti l'avversario sul tavolo dei cronisti con un momento OMG! (Giocatore singolo/Esibizione)
description.spanish: Destruye la mesa de comentaristas con tu oponente, usando un momento OMG! (Exhibición/Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏قم بإقصاء 12 خصمًا بنفس الـSuperstar في مباراة Royal Rumble واحدة. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Eliminate 12 opponents with the same Superstar in a single Royal Rumble match. (Single play)
description.french: Éliminez 12 adversaires avec la même Superstar lors d'un seul match Royal Rumble (mode solo).
description.german: Eliminiere 12 Gegner mit demselben Superstar in einem einzigen Royal Rumble Match. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Elimina 12 avversari con la stessa Superstar in un match Royal Rumble. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Elimina a 12 rivales en un mismo Royal Rumble con la misma Superstar. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏اربح 20 مباراة مختلفة. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Win in 20 match variations. (Single play)
description.french: Remportez 20 variations de match (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne in 20 verschiedenen Match-Varianten. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci in 20 variazioni di match. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Gana en 20 variaciones de combate. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏قدم مباراة إلى النهاية مع 50 Superstar مختلفًا. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Complete a match with 50 different Superstars. (Single play)
description.french: Terminez un match avec 50 Superstars différentes (mode solo).
description.german: Absolviere ein Match mit 50 unterschiedlichen Superstars. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Completa un match con 50 Superstar differenti. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Completa un combate con 50 Superstars diferentes. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏اربح 10 مرات باستخدام Superstar مخصص. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Win 10 times using a custom Superstar. (Single play)
description.french: Gagnez 10 fois avec une Superstar personnalisée (mode solo).
description.german: Gewinne 10-mal mit einem erstellten Superstar. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Vinci 10 volte con una Superstar personalizzata. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Gana 10 veces con una Superstar personalizada. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: اجعل أحد الخصوم يستسلم باستخدام حركة استسلام ليست حركة Finisher ولا حركة Signature. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Make an opponent tap out with a submission that is not a Finisher or Signature move. (Single Play)
description.french: Soumettez un adversaire via une soumission qui n'est ni un Finisher ni un Coup Spécial (mode solo).
description.german: Bringe 1 Gegner per Aufgabe-Move, der kein Finisher o. Signature-Move ist, zur Aufgabe. (Einzelsp.)
description.italian: Vinci con una sottomissione che non sia una mossa finale o speciale. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Haz rendirse a un rival con una sumisión que no sea remate ni movimiento personal. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏باستخدام Lesnar، نفذ حركة 'German Suplex 4' أو'Back Suplex 2' في مباراة واحدة 10 مرات. (لعب فردي)
description.english: With Lesnar, execute "German Suplex 4" or "Back Suplex 2" 10 times in a single match. (Single play)
description.french: Avec Brock Lesnar, exécutez 10 ''German Suplex 4'' ou ''Back Suplex 2'' en un match (mode solo).
description.german: Führe mit Lesnar den German Suplex 4 oder den Back Suplex 2 10-mal in einem Match aus. (Einzelsp.)
description.italian: Con Lesnar, esegui 10 'German Suplex 4' o 'Back Suplex 2' in un solo match. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Con Lesnar, haz un German Suplex 4 o Back Suplex 2 10 veces en un combate. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏دمر طاولتي مذيع في مباراة واحدة. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Destroy 2 announce tables within a single match. (Single play)
description.french: Détruisez 2 tables de commentateurs dans le même match (mode solo).
description.german: Zerstöre 2 Ansagertische in einem einzigen Match. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Distruggi 2 tavoli dei cronisti nello stesso match. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Destruye 2 mesas de comentaristas en un solo combate. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏نفذ حركة عكس كبرى بنجاح. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Successfully perform a major reversal. (Single play)
description.french: Réussissez un contre majeur (mode solo).
description.german: Führe erfolgreich einen schweren Reversal aus. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Metti a segno un contrattacco maggiore. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Completa una inversión mayor. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏أنشئ عرضًا يستخدم حلبة مخصصة وشعاراً مستورداً كشعاره.
description.english: Create a show that uses a custom Arena and an imported Logo for its show logo.
description.french: Créez un show utilisant une arène personnalisée et un logo du show importé.
description.german: Erstelle eine Show mit einer eigenen Arena und einem importierten Logo.
description.italian: Crea uno show con un'arena personalizzata e un logo importato come emblema dello show.
description.spanish: Crea un show que utilice una arena personalizada y un logotipo importado como logotipo del show.

description.arabic: استخدم بطولة مخصصة واربح مباراة. (لعب فردي)
description.english: Use a custom Championship and win a match. (Single play)
description.french: Utilisez un titre personnalisé et gagnez un match (mode solo).
description.german: Benutze eine erstellte Championship und gewinne ein Match. (Einzelspieler)
description.italian: Usa un titolo personalizzato e vinci un match. (Giocatore singolo)
description.spanish: Usa un título personalizado y gana un combate. (Un jugador)

description.arabic: ‏ WWE عبر الإنترنت - اكتسب ميدالية برونزية. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.english: WWE Online - Earn a Bronze medal. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.french: WWE en ligne - Gagnez une médaille de bronze. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.german: WWE-Online - Gewinne eine Bronzemedaille. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.italian: WWE Online - Ottieni una medaglia di bronzo. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.spanish: WWE En línea - Gana una medalla de bronce. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)

description.arabic: ‏ WWE عبر الإنترنت - اكتسب ميدالية فضية. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.english: WWE Online - Earn a Silver medal. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.french: WWE en ligne - Gagnez une médaille d'argent. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.german: WWE-Online - Gewinne eine Silbermedaille. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.italian: WWE Online - Ottieni una medaglia d'argento. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.spanish: WWE En línea - Gana una medalla de plata. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)

description.arabic: ‏ WWE عبر الإنترنت - اكتسب ميدالية ذهبية. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.english: WWE Online - Earn a Gold medal. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.french: WWE en ligne - Gagnez une médaille d'or. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.german: WWE-Online - Gewinne eine Goldmedaille. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.italian: WWE Online - Ottieni una medaglia d'oro. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)
description.spanish: WWE En línea - Gana una medalla de oro. (WWE Live, 2K Tonight)

description.arabic: ‏اربح مباراة اتحاد
description.english: Win a Team Up match.
description.french: Remportez un match en équipe.
description.german: Gewinne ein Team bilden-Match.
description.italian: Vinci un match Alleanza.
description.spanish: Gana un combate en Combate en equipo.

description.arabic: ‏اربح الـMain Event في 2K Tonight.
description.english: Win the main event in 2K Tonight.
description.french: Remportez le Main Event de 2K Tonight.
description.german: Gewinne den Hauptkampf beim 2K Tonight.
description.italian: Vinci il main event in 2K Tonight.
description.spanish: Gana el evento principal de 2K Tonight.

description.arabic: ‏نفذ حركة Suplex City عندما تكون Brock Lesnar واربح المباراة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Perform Suplex city with Brock Lesnar and win that match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Exécutez un Suplex city avec Brock Lesnar et remportez le match. (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Führe einen Suplex City mit Brock Lesnar aus und gewinne das Match. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Esegui una Suplex City con Brock Lesnar e vinci il match. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Ejecuta Suplex City con Brock Lesnar y gana el combate. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اربح WWE World Heavyweight Championship.
description.english: MyCAREER - Win the WWE World Heavyweight Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Remportez le WWE World Heavyweight Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die WWE World Heavyweight Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Vinci il WWE World Heavyweight Championship.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el WWE World Heavyweight Championship.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - أكمل البرنامج التعليمي.
description.english: MyCAREER - Complete the tutorial.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Terminez l'initiation.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Schließe das Tutorial ab.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Completa el tutorial.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - أكمل أول مباراة لك في RAW أو SmackDown.
description.english: MyCAREER - Complete your first match in RAW or SmackDown.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Terminez votre premier match à RAW ou SmackDown.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Absolviere dein erstes Match in RAW oder SmackDown.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Completa il tuo primo match a RAW o a SmackDown.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Completa tu primer combate en RAW o SmackDown.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - شارك في WrestleMania وRoyal Rumble وSummerslam وSurvivor Series.
description.english: MyCAREER - Participate in WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam, and Survivor Series.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Participez à WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam et Survivor Series.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Nimm an WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam und Survivor Series teil.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Partecipa a WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam e Survivor Series.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Participa en WrestleMania, Royal Rumble, SummerSlam y Survivor Series.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - احصل على قيمة إجمالية 95 أو أكثر.
description.english: MyCAREER - Get an overall value of 95 or more.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Obtenez une note générale de 95 ou plus.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Erreiche einen Gesamtwert von mindestens 95.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Ottieni un totale di almeno 95.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Logra un valor global de 95 o más.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اربح NXT Championship.
description.english: MyCAREER - Earn the NXT Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Remportez le NXT Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die NXT Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Vinci l'NXT Championship.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el NXT Championship.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اربح بطولة Intercontinental.
description.english: MyCAREER - Earn the Intercontinental Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Remportez l'Intercontinental Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die Intercontinental Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Vinci l'Intercontinental Championship.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el Intercontinental Championship.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اربح United States Championship.
description.english: MyCAREER - Earn the United States Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Remportez le United States Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die United States Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Vinci lo United States Championship.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el United States Championship.

displayName.italian: Nascita di un Tag Team Champion

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اربح Tag Championship.
description.english: MyCAREER - Earn the Tag Championship.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Remportez le Tag Championship.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Gewinne die Tag Championship.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Vinci il Tag Team Championship.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Gana el Tag Championship.

displayName.spanish: Soy un dios de la lucha

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اشتر كل القدرات التي يمكن شراؤها.
description.english: MyCAREER - Purchase all abilities that can be purchased.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Achetez toutes les techniques disponibles.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Kaufe alle Fähigkeiten, die man kaufen kann.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Acquista tutte le abilità possibili.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Compra todas las habilidades posibles.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اشتر كل المهارات التي يمكن شراؤها.
description.english: MyCAREER - Purchase all skills that can be purchased.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Achetez toutes les aptitudes disponibles.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Kaufe alle Talente, die man kaufen kann.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Acquista tutte le tecniche possibili.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Compra todas las técnicas posibles.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - اشتر كل المديرين الذين يمكن شراؤهم.
description.english: MyCAREER - Purchase all managers that can be purchased.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Engagez tous les managers disponibles.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Kaufe alle Manager, die man kaufen kann.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Acquista tutti i manager possibili.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Compra todos los mánager posibles.

description.arabic: ‏MyCAREER - قم بتنفيذ 10 تدخلات بنجاح.
description.english: MyCAREER - Successfully perform 10 run-ins.
description.french: Ma CARRIÈRE - Réussissez 10 interventions.
description.german: Meine KARRIERE - Greife 10-mal erfolgreich ein.
description.italian: La mia CARRIERA - Esegui con successo 10 interferenze.
description.spanish: Mi CARRERA - Realiza 10 interferencias con éxito.

description.arabic: ‏نفذ حركة Powerbomb على خصمك رامياً به على سلم موضوع على شكل جسر. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Powerbomb an opponent through a bridged ladder. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Explosez votre adversaire sur une échelle à l'horizontale. (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Führe eine Powerbomb bei einem Gegner durch eine Leiterbrücke aus. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Esegui una Powerbomb su una scala a ponte. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Usa una Powerbomb para que tu rival atraviese una escalera en forma de puente. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: ‏أنهِ مباراة في الكواليس. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Finish a match backstage. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Finissez un match en coulisses (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Beende ein Match Backstage. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Termina un match nel backstage. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Termina un combate en el vestuario. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: ‏أبعِد Superstar متدخلاً بنجاح أثناء شجار الانتصار. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Successfully fend off an interfering Superstar during a victory brawl. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Repoussez une Superstar intervenue lors d'une bagarre de victoire (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Wehre erfolgreich einen störenden Superstar während eines Siegs ab. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Respingi l'interferenza di una Superstar durante una rissa post-vittoria. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Contrataca a una Superstar que interfiera una pelea tras la victoria. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

displayName.french: Une autre façon de s'en servir

description.arabic: هاجم خصمك باستخدام حزام لقب البطولة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Attack your opponent using the Championship Title. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Attaquez votre adversaire à l'aide du titre de champion (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Greife deinen Gegner mit dem Championship-Gürtel an. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Colpisci il tuo avversario con il titolo. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Ataca a tu rival usando el título. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

displayName.french: Coup de théâtre en trois actes

description.arabic: ‏نفذ 3 حركات عكس كبرى في مباراة واحدة. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Perform 3 major reversals in a Single Match. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Réussissez 3 contres majeurs dans le même match (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Führe 3 schwere Reversals in einem einzelnen Match aus. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Esegui 3 contrattacchi maggiori nello stesso match. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Ejecuta 3 inversiones mayores en un mismo combate. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: .نفذ ترويج - WWE Universe/‏MYCAREER
description.english: WWE Universe/MyCAREER - Perform a promo.
description.french: Univers WWE/Ma CARRIÈRE - Faites une promo.
description.german: WWE-Universum/Meine KARRIERE - Halte eine Promo.
description.italian: WWE Universe/La mia CARRIERA - Esegui un promo.
description.spanish: Universo WWE/Mi CARRERA – Haz una promo.

description.arabic: ‏استهزئ بالجمهور أو الخصم. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Perform a Crowd or Opponent taunt. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Provoquez le public ou l'adversaire (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Verwende einen Taunt gegen die Zuschauer oder deinen Gegner. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Esegui un insulto folla o avversario. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Ejecuta una burla al público o al rival. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: ‏أنشئ شعار مجموعة جديداً.
description.english: Create a new Group logo.
description.french: Créez un nouveau logo assemblé.
description.german: Erstelle ein neues Gruppenlogo.
description.italian: Crea un nuovo logo Gruppo.
description.spanish: Crea un nuevo logo de grupo.

description.arabic: أكمل مباراة معرض في وقت الليل. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Complete an exhibition match at night time. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Terminez un match d'exhibition de nuit (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Beende ein Exhibition-Match bei Nacht. (In Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Completa un match esibizione di notte. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Completa un combate de Exhibición de noche. (Exhibición Vs. IA)

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe/MyCAREER - اهزم خصماً أثناء الترويج.
description.english: WWE Universe/MyCAREER- Defeat a rival in a Promo.
description.french: Univers WWE/Ma CARRIÈRE - Venez à bout d'un rival lors d'une promo.
description.german: WWE-Universum/Meine KARRIERE - Besiege einen Rivalen in einer Promo.
description.italian: WWE Universe/La mia CARRIERA - Sconfiggi un rivale in un promo.
description.spanish: Universo WWE/Mi CARRERA - Derrota a un rival en una promo.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - اربحي أو دافعي عن WWE Women's Championship في WrestleMania.
description.english: WWE Universe - Win or defend the WWE Women's Championship at WrestleMania.
description.french: Univers WWE - Remportez le WWE Women's Championship (ou défendez votre titre) à WrestleMania.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Gewinne oder verteidige die WWE Women's Championship bei WrestleMania.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Vinci o difendi il WWE Women's Championship a WrestleMania.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Gana o defiende el WWE Women's Championship en WrestleMania.

description.arabic: ‏WWE Universe - العب وأكمل كل مباراة على بطاقة المباراة التابعة للعرض.
description.english: WWE Universe - Play and complete each match on a show's match-card.
description.french: Univers WWE - Jouez et terminez tous les matchs de la liste d'un show.
description.german: WWE-Universum - Spiele und vollende jedes Match der Match-Card einer Show.
description.italian: WWE Universe - Affronta e completa ogni match nel programma di uno show.
description.spanish: Universo WWE - Juega y completa todos los combates de un show.

displayName.german: The Beast kann man nicht jagen!

description.arabic: ‏نفذ 200 حركة عكس ناجحة مع Brock Lesnar. (وضع معرض ضد الذكاء الاصطناعي)
description.english: Successfully perform 200 reversals with Brock Lesnar. (PLAY mode against A.I.)
description.french: Réussissez 200 contres avec Brock Lesnar (mode Exhibition, contre l'I.A.).
description.german: Führe 200 erfolgreiche Reversals mit Brock Lesnar aus. (Exhibition gegen KI)
description.italian: Esegui 200 contrattacchi con Brock Lesnar. (Esibizione contro I.A.)
description.spanish: Realiza con éxito 200 inversiones con Brock Lesnar. (Exhibición Vs. IA)
